channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Open-source DeepSeek-R1 uses pure reinforcement learning to match OpenAI o1 — at 95% less cost
item.description: The company developed DeepSeek-R1 by using pure reinforcement learning on top of DeepSeek-V3-Base, and matched or beat o1 on some benchmarks.

item.title: Anthropomorphizing AI: Dire consequences of mistaking human-like for human have already emerged
item.description: Anthropomorphizing AI creates dangerous blind spots in business decision-making beyond simple operational inefficiencies.

item.title: D.R. Horton sees home supply increase, but affordability is still an issue
item.description: D.R. Horton’s stock surges toward a sixth straight gain after earnings falls but beat expectations.

item.title: This expert highlights what could be the macro trade of the coming years. It’s not about Trump.

item.title: Trump’s first 100 days: What he must do on trade, immigration and tax cuts

item.title: Beyond RAG: How cache-augmented generation reduces latency, complexity for smaller workloads
item.description: As LLMs become more capable, many RAG applications can be replaced with cache-augmented generation that include documents in the prompt.

item.title: ‘I trust that my husband isn’t a gold digger’: I’m inheriting millions of dollars. My husband says I’m ‘selfish’ to keep it. Should I share it?
item.description: “I have been a stay-at-home mom for the past five years and my husband is the sole breadwinner.”

item.title: AI comes alive: From bartenders to surgical aides to puppies, tomorrow’s robots are on their way
item.description: Beyond performing tasks, machines will integrate into our social fabric, requiring us to navigate new relationships with technology.
